title: Passion fruit cream with coconut and cherry biscotti
description: This easy, make-ahead dessert will create an impressive but stress-free end to a dinner party.For this recipe you will need four attractive glasses such as Martini glasses to serve the passion fruit cream.
ingredients: 150ml/5fl oz passion fruit pulp, passed through a fine sieve
2 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water
300g/10½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
